0: While getting morning coffee that we had to pay for another guest vomited right in front of my husband after the guest just having left the hotels bar located in the lobby
It appears there are 6 elevators but some of them must not be functional

no free wi fi in the room just in the lobby no breakfast and for a 360 dollar rate it is not acetabile when in Miami South Beach in a Small hotel one block from the ocean my room was with everithing included plus sleepers and bathrope and daily rate 200 dollar chipper
The gym leaves something to desire with just a few pieces of equipment which was a surprise for a hotel of that size
As a result the line to get into an elevator would be longer than a Disneyland attraction ride
Elevator congestion around peak check in time no complaints
There are 25 floors of rooms and only one set of elevators so you may be waiting 15 30 minutes to get where you need to go
I only went inside the lobby for a picture of a sand sculpture
Unlike our most recent stay here all elevators were running without incident
Very early last Sunday morning I was staring out at the rain in an empty rear area of the lobby
1: The staff was amazing and the accommodations were great
Although the Concierge Lounge was closed the staff was extremely gracious and provided great amenities Free full breakfast buffet free appetizers from the bar free bottled water upon my request
staff were all amazing from front desk to valet great bar in lobby close to Arena
The Gym at this hotel is extraordinary
Lobby restaurant pretty good for hotel motel food
The facility is fine clean well maintained but going through some renovation while we were there
The lobby bar and its personnel were very accommodating and fun
